sections.heading: 804. Hearsay exceptions; enumerated; declarant unavailable; unavailability, defined
sections.text: (1) Unavailability as a witness includes situations in which the declarant:(a) Is exempted by ruling of the judge on the ground of privilege from testifying concerning the subject matter of his statement; or(b) Persi

sections.heading: 804(2)(e), R.R.S.1943, requires actual notice of the intent to use the out-of-court statement. State v. Leisy, 207 Neb. 118, 295 N.W.2d 715 (1980).
